  • ABOUT

    experience / skills

I am a UX designer currently working at Signifi Solutions in GTA. For the past three years, I have been creating functional, accessible, and engaging designs and applications.

My formal background in Architecture trained me to be solution-oriented and focus on the context. My digital experience designs always start beyond the screen. Every moment counts in my design practices.

I do enjoy learning to code. Building my own design and getting feedback from the development process is always helpful for me to re-think my work as a product.
